Parameter.scalarParameter:
# print if we run in a gui or not import mbxmlutils.Qt if mbxmlutils.Qt.isGUI(): print("Called from GUI") else: print("Called from none GUI")
# check if subprocess.check_output is working, if not do a hard exit to ensure that this test fails # note that subprocess.check_output is quite tricky with regard to windows GUI application where the stdout/stderr handels may be "strange" import subprocess try: out=subprocess.check_output([mbxmlutils.installPrefix()+"/bin/mbsimxml", "-h"]).decode("UTF-8") except: import traceback import sys print(traceback.format_exc()) sys.exit(9) print("First line of mbsimxml -h output: "+str(out.splitlines()[0])) ret=0
